stories.title: Vulpes et Uva (simplified)
stories.latin: Vulpes uvas videt. Uvas petere conatur. Non potest. Dicit: 'Uvae acerbae sunt.'
stories.english: The fox sees grapes. She tries to get them. She cannot. She says: 'The grapes are sour.'

stories.title: Puer et Canis
stories.latin: Puer canem amat. Canis cum puero ludit.
stories.english: The boy loves the dog. The dog plays with the boy.
